Job Description
Apex Life Sciences is looking for a Scientist!

This candidate will be supporting the contract research services. This role requires applied knowledge in cell-based methods, pharmacology principles, and direct experience in a cell-based lab.

Essential Duties and Responsibilities:

Performs work in a laboratory setting, meeting the physical job requirements of a lab role.
Conducts production assays in ADMET, BioMAP®, Immunosignaling, Ion Channel, and/or OncoPanel Services; manufacturing, lot release assays and inventory management for Cell Products.
Performs optimization experiments for the culture of human primary cell types, primarily adherent cell types.
Develops procedures for culture of new cell types and new assay development.
Contributes to the maintenance of various human primary cell types, primarily adherent cell types.
Contributes to running of complex primary human cell-based assays using automated liquid handlers.
Prepares and manages inventory of buffers, reagents, media, semi-finished and finished goods.
Maintains cell culture in a BSL2 laboratory, and adheres to cleanroom guidelines and aseptic technique, according to protocol.
Provides solutions to more complex problems, identifies and initiates process improvements
Maintains high data quality and reproducibility.
Performs data and report QC review within the department.
Takes ownership of mid-size laboratory or research and development projects with minimal supervision

Requirements:

Direct experience with mammalian cell-based assays
Demonstrated proficiency in contributing independently on a project team with time and quality metrics
Good communication and interpersonal skills
B.A. or B.S. with 5 years relevant experience
M.A. or M.S. with 3 years relevant experience
Ph.D. with 1 year relevant experience
Or an equivalent of education and experience

Additional preferences:

Scientific expertise with primary human cell types, including a record of publications is desired
Experience in a contract research organization
Experience with method development and optimization
Experience with automation, HTS applications, and large- scale screening
Experience in small team leadership and project management
Experience in leading and delivering results in R&D
